oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: I Love Country Yours And Mine catalog radio spot - MCA - 1979-07-16
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of advertisement radio spots for the I Love Country Yours & Mine music catalog by MCA Records and Tapes, recorded July 16, 1979, according to tape case.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Red Bandana (Merle Haggard) [recording, excerpt] -- [Unidentified male and female] advertise the I Love Country Yours & Mine music catalog -- If Loving You Is Wrong (I Don't Want To Be Right) [Barbara Mandrell] [recording, excerpt] -- [Unidentified] talk -- Sail Away (Oak Ridge boys) [recording, excerpt] -- [Unidentified male and female] advertise the I Love Country Yours & Mine music catalog -- Don't Take It Away (Conway Twitty) [recording, excerpt] -- [Unidentified male and female] advertise the I Love Country Yours & Mine music catalog -- Texas When I Die (Tanya Tucker) [recording, excerpt] -- [Unidentified] talk -- Tulsa Time (Don Williams) [recording, excerpt] -- [Unidentified male and female] advertise the I Love Country Yours & Mine music catalog
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: MCA Records, Inc.;
